description: "IndexError: list index out of range - The code attempted to access an item in a list that does not exist. The index used to access the list was beyond the size of the list, resulting in an index out of range error."
code:
# Create an empty list 
list_data = [] 

# Function to add elements to the list 
def add_to_list(list_data, element): 
	list_data.append(element) 
	return list_data
